verses.verse: Now you shall gather <S%H1413><s%> yourself in troops, <S%H1416><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of troops. <S%H1416><s%> He has laid <S%H7760><s%> siege <S%H4692><s%> against us. <S%H5221><s%> They will strike the judge <S%H8199><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with a rod <S%H7626><s%> on the cheek. <S%H3895><s%>

But you, <S%H1035><s%> Bethlehem Ephrathah, <S%H672><s%> being small <S%H6810><s%> among the clans <S%H505><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> out of you one will come forth <S%H3318><s%> to me that is to be ruler <S%H4910><s%> in Israel; <S%H3478><s%> whose goings forth <S%H4163><s%> are from of old, <S%H6924><s%> from everlasting. <S%H3117><s%>

Therefore he will abandon <S%H5414><s%> them until the time <S%H6256><s%> that she who is in labor <S%H3205><s%> gives birth. <S%H3205><s%> Then the rest <S%H3499><s%> of his brothers <S%H251><s%> will return <S%H7725><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He shall stand, <S%H5975><s%> and shall shepherd <S%H7462><s%> in the strength <S%H5797><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> in the majesty <S%H1347><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> his God: <S%H430><s%> and they will live, <S%H3427><s%> for then he will be great <S%H1431><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

He will be our peace <S%H7965><s%> when Assyria <S%H804><s%> invades <S%H935><s%> our land, <S%H776><s%> and when he marches <S%H1869><s%> through our fortresses, <S%H759><s%> then we will raise <S%H6965><s%> against him seven <S%H7651><s%> shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> leaders <S%H5257><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>

They will rule <S%H7462><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Nimrod <S%H5248><s%> in its gates. <S%H6607><s%> He will deliver <S%H5337><s%> us from the Assyrian, <S%H804><s%> when he invades <S%H935><s%> our land, <S%H776><s%> and when he marches <S%H1869><s%> within our border. <S%H1366><s%>

The remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> will be in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> like dew <S%H2919><s%> from Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> like showers <S%H7241><s%> on the grass, <S%H6212><s%> that don't <S%H6960><s%> wait for man, <S%H376><s%> nor wait <S%H3176><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>

The remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> will be among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> like a lion <S%H738><s%> among the animals <S%H929><s%> of the forest, <S%H3293><s%> like a young lion <S%H3715><s%> among the flocks <S%H5739><s%> of sheep; <S%H6629><s%> who, <S%H5674><s%> if he goes through, treads down <S%H7429><s%> and tears in pieces, <S%H2963><s%> and there is no one to deliver. <S%H5337><s%>
Let your hand <S%H3027><s%> be lifted up <S%H7311><s%> above your adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> and let all of your enemies <S%H341><s%> be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>

"It will happen in that day, <S%H3117><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "That I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> your horses <S%H5483><s%> out of the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you, <S%H6><s%> and will destroy your chariots. <S%H4818><s%>
I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the cities <S%H6145><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> and will tear down <S%H2040><s%> all your strongholds. <S%H4013><s%>
I will destroy <S%H3772><s%> witchcraft <S%H3785><s%> from your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and you shall have no soothsayers. <S%H6049><s%>

I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> your engraved images <S%H6456><s%> and your pillars <S%H4676><s%> out of your midst; <S%H7130><s%> and you shall no more worship <S%H7812><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%>
I will uproot <S%H5428><s%> your Asherim <S%H842><s%> out of your midst; <S%H7130><s%> and I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> your cities. <S%H6145><s%>
I will execute <S%H6213><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> in anger, <S%H639><s%> and wrath <S%H2534><s%> on the nations <S%H1471><s%> that didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen."
